title: Assist Customer at Self-Checkout
description: A customer at a self-checkout kiosk needs help because an item won't scan.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the alert from the self-checkout kiosk.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate is notified that a customer needs assistance.

tasks.description: Attempt to scan the item. If it fails, look up the item manually by name or department.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate finds the item in the system.

tasks.description: Add the item to the customer's transaction manually and clear the error so the customer can continue.
tasks.expected_outcome: The item is added, and the customer is able to complete their purchase.
